channel.title: Infinity - ECO Brand New Server Staff Spots Open (Your Experience is Infinite)
channel.description:
[center]
[size=2.65em]Hello everyone! Welcome to Infinity ECO. [/size] [size=1.35em]My name is Tyler.[/size]
Brand New 667 Server.
[url=http://infinityeco.clanwebsite.com/]Infinity Website[/url]
[url=https://dl.dropbox.com/s/6jvqt76ycnm35rs/Infinity%20V1.jar?dl=0]Client Download[/url]
Staff Spots Are Open Owner/ Co-Owner Cody Thomas Admin Dnasdagar Open Mod Open Open Server Support Brents
[size=1.35em]Economy[/size] I do not believe because there is a spawn server, that only allows you to spawn armour, and potions, and food, makes it not able to be an Economy stable server. This server in fact is that plus more, you are allowed to spawn here, just the items allowed to spawn are limited.
[font=verdana][size=medium]PvP[/size][/font] I know loads of people love to just hop on and pvp, just for the kicks, so i made it suitable for there needs, but also made it so they dont ruin the fun for people looking for the hard ways of Skilling and leveling up or getting gear.
[code]Newest Updates - Few Pking Shops at home - Perfected Combat Pking wise/Monster wise - Added simple Welcome to New People - Fixed all drop rates for all Monsters - Make Server ECO/PVP Friendly
[/code]
[u][b][size=18pt]Media[/size][/b][/u] [spoiler] Pk Shop [img]http://i.imgur.com/CbreqoG.png[/img]
Task Tab Revised
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7UzIg3l.png[/img]
Home Portals, Pouches, Slayer Master
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Mk9pjx4.png[/img]
Home [img]http://i.imgur.com/1i2U30v.png[/img]
SHOPS [img]http://i.imgur.com/1pS5sDe.png[/img]
NewShops Dialogue Easier Access Shops [img]http://i.imgur.com/0so5s4D.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/vIVYgUp.png[/img]
Teleport and Prestige Master
[img]http://i.imgur.com/qtuPgw3.png[/img]
[/spoiler]
[size=14pt][b]Features[/b][/size] [spoiler]Over 20+ PvM Teleports Including Nomad, Armadyl, Bandos, Saradomin, Nex, Corp, KBD, Tormented Demons, Barrows, Brimhaven Dungeon, Dragons, Rock Crabs, Glaciors, Jadinko Lair, Tzhaar Volcano, Polypore Dungeon, Slayer Tower, Reverants, Bork, Mith Dragon, Wild Wyrm, +More [font=arial black][size=10pt]Skilling Teleports :[/size][/font] Woodcutting, Dung, Runecrafting, Agility, Fishing, Cooking, +More There are many features. All sorts of PvM from barrows to jad and even revs, All working skills, many types of currency including PkP Tickets and Dungeoneering Coins, and more! Combat is perfect. PvP and PvM are great because of the awesome combat system. Custom PvM and Pk Shops. [/spoiler][/code][/center]

item.title: Infinity - ECO Brand New Server Staff Spots Open (Your Experience is Infinite)
item.dc:creator: @Fr33dom99 Fr33dom99
item.description:
@Fr33dom99 wrote:

[center]

[size=2.65em]Hello everyone! Welcome to Infinity ECO. [/size]
[size=1.35em]My name is Tyler.[/size]

Brand New 667 Server.

Infinity Website

Client Download

Staff Spots Are Open
Owner/ Co-Owner
Cody
Thomas

Dnasdagar
Open

Open
Open
Server Support
Brents

[size=1.35em]Economy[/size]
I do not believe because there is a spawn server, that only allows you to spawn armour, and potions, and food, makes it not able to be an
Economy stable server. This server in fact is that plus more, you are allowed to spawn here, just the items allowed to spawn are limited.

[font=verdana][size=medium]PvP[/size][/font]
I know loads of people love to just hop on and pvp, just for the kicks, so i made it suitable for there needs, but also made it so they dont ruin the fun for people looking for the hard ways of Skilling and leveling up or getting gear.

[code]Newest Updates

  • Few Pking Shops at home
  • Perfected Combat Pking wise/Monster wise
  • Added simple Welcome to New People
  • Fixed all drop rates for all Monsters
  • Make Server ECO/PVP Friendly

[/code]

Home Portals, Pouches, Slayer Master

There are many features. All sorts of PvM from barrows to jad and even revs, All working skills, many types of currency including PkP Tickets and Dungeoneering Coins, and more! Combat is perfect. PvP and PvM are great because of the awesome combat system. Custom PvM and Pk Shops.
